channel.title: CVE Feed for sersis -- WordSurvey
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sersis -- WordSurvey

item.title: CVE-2024-6767|2024-08-21T13:32:54.383Z -- sersis -- wordsurvey
item.description: The WordSurvey plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘sounding_title’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 3.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level access, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. This only affects multi-site installations and installations where unfiltered_html has been disabled.
